20110131014227.000|20110131014229.000|CC1|       THOUGHTS OR ACTIONS      
20110131014229.000|20110131014229.000|CC1|           WHILE TAKING         
20110131014229.000|20110131014231.000|CC1|    OR AFTER STOPPING CHANTIX.  
20110131014231.000|20110131014231.000|CC1|       IF YOU NOTICE ANY OF     
20110131014231.000|20110131014233.000|CC1|   THESE SYMPTOMS OR BEHAVIORS, 
20110131014233.000|20110131014233.000|CC1|   STOP TAKING CHANTIX AND CALL 
20110131014233.000|20110131014236.000|CC1|     YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY.    
20110131014236.000|20110131014236.000|CC1|         TELL YOUR DOCTOR       
20110131014236.000|20110131014238.000|CC1| ABOUT ANY HISTORY OF DEPRESSION
20110131014238.000|20110131014238.000|CC1|             OR OTHER           
20110131014238.000|20110131014239.000|CC1|     MENTAL HEALTH PROBLEMS,    
20110131014239.000|20110131014239.000|CC1|      WHICH COULD GET WORSE
